basics.label: Banking Professional
basics.summary: Hands-on, client-oriented banking professional who implements creative investment strategies and is dedicated to continuous improvement. Entry level banking focused on applying excellent research skills and writing ability to a position in business management. Enthusiastic business major with excellent communication skills and strong motivation to succeed.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Opened new customer accounts, including checking, savings and lines of credit. Balanced daily cash deposits and bank vault inventory with a zero error rate. Processed cash withdrawals. Researched and resolved customer issues on personal savings, checking and lines of credit accounts. Delivered prompt, accurate and excellent customer service. Researched banking guidelines and statutory requirements to stay updated on new laws and applications.
highlights: Collaborated with prospective clients to prepare efficient product marketing strategies and drive business development.

work.summary: Managing and editing the company's online area and the educative software (Moodle). Developing and preparing accounting, statistics and Office subject papers (Word, Excel,PowerPoint).
